howItWorks.title: How to use the Pomodoro Timer?

content.title: Master the productivity game
content.step1: Focus on your work for 25 minutes
content.step2: Take a short break, then repeat
content.step3: After three cycles, take a longer break
content.step4: Keep repeating until you are done!

getInTouch.title: Get in touch
getInTouch.content: Tomatoro is an open source code project. You may play around with the code source and apply it for your own projects. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us!. We are always happy to hear from you! :)
